#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <ctype.h>

// Function to check if a character is punctuation
int is_punctuation(char c) {
    return c == '.' || c == ',' || c == '!' || c == '?';
}

// Function to check if a character is a vowel (case-insensitive)
int is_vowel(char c) {
    char lower = tolower(c);
    return lower == 'a' || lower == 'e' || lower == 'i' || lower == 'o' || lower == 'u' || lower == 'y';
}

int main() {
    // Read input
    char input[10000];
    fgets(input, sizeof(input), stdin);
    size_t input_len = strlen(input);
    if (input_len > 0 && input[input_len-1] == '\n') {
        input[input_len-1] = '\0'; // remove newline
        input_len--;
    }

    // Process first step
    char *processed = NULL;
    size_t processed_cap = 0;
    size_t processed_len = 0;

    for (size_t i = 0; i < input_len; i++) {
        char c = input[i];

        if (i == 0) {
            // First character
            if (isspace(c) || is_punctuation(c)) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // Append to processed
                if (processed_len + 1 >= processed_cap) {
                    processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap * 2 : 1;
                    processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                }
                processed[processed_len++] = c;
            }
        } else {
            if (isspace(c)) {
                // Check last character in processed
                if (processed_len == 0 || processed[processed_len - 1] != ' ') {
                    if (processed_len + 1 >= processed_cap) {
                        processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap * 2 : 1;
                        processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                    }
                    processed[processed_len++] = ' ';
                }
            } else if (is_punctuation(c)) {
                // Check last character
                if (processed_len > 0 && processed[processed_len - 1] == ' ') {
                    // Remove the space
                    processed_len--;
                }
                // Append punctuation
                if (processed_len + 1 >= processed_cap) {
                    processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap * 2 : 1;
                    processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                }
                processed[processed_len++] = c;
                // Append space after punctuation
                if (processed_len + 1 >= processed_cap) {
                    processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap * 2 : 1;
                    processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                }
                processed[processed_len++] = ' ';
            } else {
                // Append the character
                if (processed_len + 1 >= processed_cap) {
                    processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap * 2 : 1;
                    processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                }
                processed[processed_len++] = c;
            }
        }
    }
    // Null-terminate the processed string
    if (processed) {
        processed = realloc(processed, processed_len + 1);
        processed[processed_len] = '\0';
    }

    // Now process the second step
    const char *str = processed;
    int found = 0;
    for (int i = strlen(str) - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        char c = str[i];
        if (c == ' ' || c == '?') {
            continue;
        } else {
            // Check vowel
            char lower_c = tolower(c);
            if (is_vowel(lower_c)) {
                printf("YES\n");
            } else {
                printf("NO\n");
            }
            found = 1;
            break;
        }
    }
    if (!found) {
        // In case all are spaces or '?', but according to first processing, leading punctuation and spaces are removed. 
        // But maybe the processed string is empty? Then the second loop would not find anything. 
        // But according to first processing, the first character can't be space or punctuation, so if the input was all spaces/punctuation, the processed string is empty. 
        // Then the second loop would not find anything, but the code would not print anything. But the second Python code would have no output?

        // So in that case, the program would not print anything. But according to the second Python code, if the input is empty, the loop would not run, so no output. 

        // But the problem says the second program's output is the final output. So in this case, the program would output nothing. 

        // But the problem requires that the final C program behaves identically.

    }

    free(processed);
    return 0;
}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <ctype.h>

int is_punctuation(char c) {
    return c == '.' || c == ',' || c == '!' || c == '?';
}

int is_vowel(char c) {
    c = tolower(c);
    return c == 'a' || c == 'e' || c == 'i' || c == 'o' || c == 'u' || c == 'y';
}

int main() {
    char input[10000];
    fgets(input, sizeof(input), stdin);
    size_t input_len = strlen(input);
    if (input_len > 0 && input[input_len-1] == '\n') {
        input[input_len-1] = '\0';
        input_len--;
    }

    char *processed = NULL;
    size_t processed_cap = 0;
    size_t processed_len = 0;

    for (size_t i = 0; i < input_len; i++) {
        char c = input[i];

        if (i == 0) {
            if (isspace(c) || is_punctuation(c)) {
                continue;
            } else {
                if (processed_len +1 >= processed_cap) {
                    processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap *2 : 1;
                    processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                }
                processed[processed_len++] = c;
            }
        } else {
            if (isspace(c)) {
                if (processed_len == 0 || processed[processed_len-1] != ' ') {
                    if (processed_len +1 >= processed_cap) {
                        processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap *2 : 1;
                        processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                    }
                    processed[processed_len++] = ' ';
                }
            } else if (is_punctuation(c)) {
                if (processed_len >0 && processed[processed_len-1] == ' ') {
                    processed_len--;
                }
                if (processed_len +1 >= processed_cap) {
                    processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap *2 : 1;
                    processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                }
                processed[processed_len++] = c;
            } else {
                if (processed_len +1 >= processed_cap) {
                    processed_cap = processed_cap ? processed_cap *2 : 1;
                    processed = realloc(processed, processed_cap);
                }
                processed[processed_len++] = c;
            }
        }
    }

    if (processed) {
        processed = realloc(processed, processed_len +1);
        processed[processed_len] = '\0';
    }

    const char *str = processed;
    int found = 0;
    for (int i = strlen(str) -1; i >=0; i--) {
        char c = str[i];
        if (c == ' ' || c == '?') {
            continue;
        } else {
            char lower_c = tolower(c);
            if (is_vowel(lower_c)) {
                printf("YES\n");
            } else {
                printf("NO\n");
            }
            found = 1;
            break;
        }
    }

    free(processed);
    return 0;
}
